spec_data.Name: nodejs-promise
spec_data.Description:
This is a bare bones Promises/A+ implementation for Node.js. It is designed
to get the basics spot on correct, so that you can build extended promise
implementations on top of it.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 03:48:52 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Bare bones Promises/A+ implementation for Node.js
